summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 47th Avenue Southwest from West Andover Street to West Hanford Street, and certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same all in accordance with Resolution No. 15477 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
